1647880.name: Path of Kami Journey Begins Soundtrack
1647880.description:
Experience the world and emotion of Path of Kami with the relaxing score from composer Mark Choi. The Path of Kami: Journey Begins (Original Soundtrack) features 9 tracks that highlight the relaxing atmosphere, environments, and thrilling moments you'll experience in this adventure.


Total Time: 25:47

Credits


Music Composer: Mark Choi

Soundtrack Art: Shannon Curran
